channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-19822] camel-azure-files - assert failure in the implementation of move=
item.description:
Component: camel-azure-files 3.22.0-SNAPSHOT

 
from(samples + "/" + example + "?" + authParams + "&move=/consumed/" + example + "&repeatCount=3").log(

"${header.CamelFileName} discovered and consumed (size=${header.CamelFileLength}, modified=${header.CamelFileLastModified})")

.log("Content: ${body}");

item.summary: camel-azure-files - assert failure in the implementation of move=

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Can you post the real code in the route you use - we cant see what "sample" means

static String samples = "azure-files://camelazurefiles/samples";

 

so too much concrete, anyway the key is to run JVM with enabled asserts -ea.

 

The hotfix is evident, I try to prepare a PR to 3.x. 

 

I'm not sure the assert 100% matches a code contract (the contract reverse-engineering is a bit hard) but this time the assert caught a bug in caller.
